0.user_question: For the walls of the house he would use 12 large planks of wood and 17 small planks. If each large plank of wood needs 14 pieces of nails to be secured and each small plank needs 25 nails. How many planks does John need for the house wall?

ost_step.1: John uses 12 large planks of wood.
ost_step.2: He also uses 17 small planks of wood.
ost_step.3: Altogether, John uses 12 (large) + 17 (small) = 29 planks of wood for the house wall.
